did.head: Descriptive Summary

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The Wilson Reader, Accession #5494, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These papers were given to the University of Virginia Library by Frances Farmer, Law Library, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Virginia, on November 16, 1956.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of ca. four items, including two sets of corrected galleys, page proofs and manuscript pages of The Wilson Reader, edited by Frances Farmer, Law Librarian at the University of Virginia, and published in New York in 1956.
